thread.title: Guess Which Bollywood Actress Is Making A Comeback With A Web Series
thread.title_full: Guess Which Bollywood Actress Is Making A Comeback With A Web Series

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Guess Which Bollywood Actress Is Making A Comeback With A Web Series
text:
Sukriti Gumber Mar . 31 . 2017 Shamita Shetty 
Shamita Shetty made her debut with the Shah Rukh Kha n starrer Mohabbatein, back in 2000. She was last seen in Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa , and was also a contestant in Bigg Boss Season 3 – but left it midway to attend her sister Shilpa Shetty ‘s wedding. 
Now the actress is making a comeback to acting – with a web series! According to reports, the makers discussed the concept and her character sketch with her, and she instantly agreed to be a part of it. She has also started attending workshops to prep for her role. She took to Twitter to share her excitement about the new project: 
— Shamita Shetty (@ShamitaShetty) March 29, 2017 
Are you excited about her digital debut? Tell me in the comments below! 0
